titleNullable: Right and Left wing news articles with NLP
subtitleNullable: various info scraped from common left and right news websites
descriptionNullable:
### In today's world where Attention is a scarce commodity, news agencies have diverted towards spreading straight-out propaganda rather than actually stating the facts and providing a reasonable argument. Once you have chosen your orientation it's like a rabbit hole and you don't even wanna listen to what anyone who identifies as some else has to say
## Make your own dataset through https://github.com/xali77/News-website-Scraper
### This dataset has 2 files each for self proclaimed left and right news websites news articles and nlp done on them
